p.d: A mysterious customer rents the B&B just for himself, to provide inspiration for a new screenplay. Rita promises to protect his anonymity, but that's easier said than done when you live in Saint-Prospere... So when Gilberte tries to help the visitor, a booking error complicates everything. Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
